6a0bad784f056988b3b84b75baa397ac78102a24.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations after recent commits.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.

6d5c0da42fa54ceabbc1959e9db354ed64a2ff86.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this keyword. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.
 For example:
 ```
 this.a = 3;
 ```

4d6e2376db89b69167de867bfc28f8d8624a6b78.commitMessage:
Move constants to left side of comparison. #1555

Fixes `ConstantOnLHSOfComparison` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on comparison operations with constant values on their left-hand side. Some coding conventions specify that constants should be on the right-hand side of comparisons.

89005ddf6d5d8b494e4451d16df9fd8996c735a9.commitMessage:
Replace calls to equals() on enums with identity comparison

This replacement is safe because two enum constants are equal only when they have the same identity.

09a7ca60414ea04b64f45bb190eaa26c767086be.commitMessage: Issue #537 refactoring: remove copy-paste of messages from UTests
